summary: Tested CMS Integration and AQI Web Crawl features. Backend: 13/13 tests passed (100%). Frontend: Dashboard displays dynamic CMS dump yard data (10,000 tons/day), AQI widget shows Dammaiguda: 220 (Unhealthy), Hyderabad: 146 (Poor). Admin CMS tab works correctly with editable dump yard statistics.

issues: When entering phone number with +91 prefix, the prefix gets duplicated (shows +91 9199999999). Recommend using just 10-digit number without prefix.

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/content/dumpyard - returns CMS config with daily_waste_tons: 10000 (admin-edited), area_acres: 350, red_zone_km: 2
Backend: GET /api/content/dumpyard - includes health_risks array and affected_groups array
Backend: PUT /api/content/dumpyard - admin can update dump yard config, changes persist
Backend: PUT /api/content/dumpyard - requires authentication (401/403 without token)
Backend: GET /api/aqi/both - returns live AQI for Dammaiguda (220) and Hyderabad (146) from aqi.in
Backend: GET /api/aqi/dammaiguda - returns single location AQI with PM2.5, PM10 pollutants
Backend: AQI response includes health_impact and health_impact_te (Telugu)
Backend: AQI response includes category, color, and source (aqi.in)
Backend: GET /api/content/all - returns all editable content grouped by category
Frontend: Login with admin phone 9999999999 + OTP 123456 works, token saved to localStorage
Frontend: Dashboard displays AQI widget with Dammaiguda: 220 (Very Unhealthy), Hyderabad: 146 (Poor)
Frontend: Dashboard displays Dump Yard card with 10,000 tons/day, 350 acres, 2km Red Zone Active
Frontend: Admin CMS tab shows Dump Yard Statistics section with all values
Frontend: Admin Edit Dump Yard dialog shows all editable fields (tons/day, acres, km, status, notes, health risks, affected groups)
Frontend: Admin CMS tab shows Banners (2) and Citizen Benefits (3) sections
critical_code_review_comments: CMS integration working correctly - Dashboard fetches from /api/content/dumpyard and displays dynamic data
AQI web crawl working - scrapes real data from aqi.in using BeautifulSoup
Admin CMS tab provides full control over dump yard statistics with proper edit dialog
seed_data_creation: None - used existing CMS data with admin-edited dump yard config (10000 tons/day)
context_for_next_testing_agent: CMS Integration and AQI Web Crawl fully working. Dashboard displays dynamic dump yard data from CMS (10,000 tons/day). AQI widget shows live data from aqi.in web scraper. Admin CMS tab allows editing all dump yard statistics. Login works with existing admin user (9999999999 + OTP 123456).

cms_integration.dashboard_display: WORKING - Shows 10,000 tons/day, 350 acres, 2km Red Zone Active
cms_integration.admin_cms_tab: WORKING - Shows Dump Yard Statistics with Edit button
cms_integration.edit_dialog: WORKING - All fields editable (tons/day, acres, km, status, notes, health risks, affected groups)

aqi_web_crawl.dashboard_widget: WORKING - Shows Dammaiguda AQI prominently with Hyderabad as secondary
